plot: In this allegorical film, a surrealist magician seamlessly performs a coin trick but doesn't seem to be fully in control of the ultimate trick under his sleeve.
title: Menuda urbe
plot_es: In this allegorical film, a surrealist magician seamlessly performs a coin trick but doesn't seem to be fully in control of the ultimate trick under his sleeve.
plot_en: In this allegorical film, a surrealist magician seamlessly performs a coin trick but doesn't seem to be fully in control of the ultimate trick under his sleeve.
